name: Cluster memory usage

question: What is the total memory available in the cluster?

name: Cluster CPU usage ($interval avg)
description: This PromQL query measures the average CPU usage across the entire cluster over a specified time interval.
question: What is the average CPU usage of the cluster?

description: This PromQL query measures the average CPU usage across the entire cluster over a specified time interval.

question: Is the cluster CPU usage increasing or decreasing over time?

name: Used
description: This PromQL query measures the amount of a specific resource or metric that is currently in use.
